metadata.dc:author: Oyarzún, E
González, P
Robert, J A
Heusser, F
Gormaz, G
metadata.dc:description: Fundamentals of fetal echocardiography are stated, describing a detailed identification of the fetal heart and the echographic, visualization of the great vessels. The importance of prenatal diagnose of congenital fetal cardiac malformations is emphasized.
metadata.dc:title: Ecocardiografía fetal I: Fundamentos.
[Fetal echocardiography I: Foundations].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista chilena de obstetricia y ginecologia
